Yeah sorry about that. So, the onProviderDisabled update will come when one of the 2 providers we're using(GPS and network) gets disabled, which simply means that the location updates will cease for that provider, and as soon as it gets enabled again, the updates will resume.
And we already have a check in place  which ensures that if the providers are already disabled, we send the user to the appropriate settings page.
